flounder.shaders

Class UniformVec3

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.shaders.Uniform
      • flounder.shaders.UniformVec3

  • public class UniformVec3
extends Uniform
    Represents a 3 value vector uniform type that can be loaded to the shader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UniformVec3(java.lang.String name) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadVec3(Attenuation attenuation)
      Loads a Attenuation factor to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
      void loadVec3(Colour colour)
      Loads a Colour to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
      void loadVec3(float x, float y, float z)
      Loads a x, y and z value to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
      void loadVec3(Vector3f vector)
      Loads a Vector3f to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.

    • Method Detail

      • loadVec3

        public void loadVec3(Vector3f vector)
        Loads a Vector3f to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
        Parameters:
        vector - The new vector.

      • loadVec3

        public void loadVec3(float x,
                     float y,
                     float z)
        Loads a x, y and z value to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x value.
        y - The new y value.
        z - The new z value.

      • loadVec3

        public void loadVec3(Colour colour)
        Loads a Colour to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
        Parameters:
        colour - The new colour.

      • loadVec3

        public void loadVec3(Attenuation attenuation)
        Loads a Attenuation factor to the uniform if the value already on the GPU is not the same as the new value.
        Parameters:
        attenuation - The new attenuation.
